resources.string: Save Current WiFi Name To Favourites

TO GET STARTED

 Make sure to hit Always Allow in location settings-permissions for the Noti-Fi app, this only ensures that it can find your WiFi connection. 


Click the dots at the top for the Permissions Video tutorial
________________________________________________


ADD A NEW WIFI NAME

 Step 1: Click Manage Saved WiFi Names

 Step 2: To save the WiFi that you are currently connected to, click Save Current WiFi Name To Favourites or manually enter the SSID and click Add 


________________________________________________


DELETE A SAVED WIFI NAME

 Step 1: Click Manage Saved WiFi Names

 Step 2: Choose the WiFi you want to delete from the dropdown menu under "Delete Saved WiFi Name"

 Step 3: Once selected, click Delete Selected WiFi Name


________________________________________________


CREATE NEW NOTIFICATION

 Step 1: Click Create New Notification

 Step 2: Enter notification description

 Step 3: Select one of your saved WiFi names from the options

 Step 4: Click Save


________________________________________________


DELETE A NOTIFICATION

 Step 1: Click Delete Notification

 Step 2: Select the WiFi name for the notification that you want to delete

 Step 3: Click Delete

How does the app work?

 When your phone connects to WiFi, the app will see which network you connect to. After it connects to a WiFi connection, it will check if you have made a notification for this WiFi name. If you have, it will send the reminder notification to your phone.


Why Does This App Need Location Services?

 This app does not keep track of location or use any GPS data. The only reason it requires location permissions in the foreground and background is because the app needs to read the WiFi network names. Google does not allow apps to get the name without location permissions.


Does the app use GPS?

 Nope! This app does not keep track of location or use any GPS data.


Create a notification isn't working?

 In order to create a new notification, you must make sure that you have a Wifi name saved for it first in Manage Saved Wifi Names from the Main page


Why Is There A Running Notification?

 Android now requires all apps that run in the background to have an active notification.


What is running in the background?

 The task running in the background is waiting for a WiFi change, nothing else.


Who Created This App?

 3 Thompson Rivers University students have made this app for a final project :)
